title: Riot Leaver Buster is a fuckin joke.
body: Ok, i understand being toxic and being afk for 10 min is a good reason to give someone a x5 20 min queue (not really) But i have gotten it for the most stupid fucking reason..i played 5 games yesterday and the day before heck even months on this computer so there's nothing wrong with my computer, My fkn client decides to crash mid fkn game and i tried to restart it and loaded up and after 3 min of playing it crashes again. And i've restarted it and the game was over..could you atleast not give a low priority to queue to the people atleast trying to get back in the game??? like ffs and make it that after you waited 20 min to queue and some dickhead didn't accept make it that we dont have to wait 20 whole fuckin minutes again? like come on this is just ridiculous your getting your customers mixed up with ur haters.

replies.body:
Yeah that's pretty crappy, surely they can detect abnormal crashes from other instances of the application closing, well actually I know for a fact they can as I have done it in a program I wrote some years ago (and winblows hasn't changed that much on that front).

Ummm so yeah probably just lazy I guess and they CBF.
